page.title: 08HEALTH
page.content: There is{no resident doctor}in the village. {Surgeries}are held in the Social Centre (Village Hall) from 9a.m. to 10a.m. on{Mondays and Fridays. {Prescriptions}have to be taken to Cheltenham, 3 miles, or Gloucester, 7 miles, for dispensing. A{baby clinic}meets on the first and third Wednesday of each month and is attended by mothers with children under five years of age.{Health {Visitors, Nurses and Doctors}are in attendance, otherwise all help is voluntary. The clinic was started in 1920 and is the{oldest Mother and Baby {Clinic in the county.
